title: So the reason Zed is not actually broken
body:
Is his damage stupid? Yes. Can he solo carry? Hell nah he cant.

*i can already smell the salty hate comments*

replies.body: No salt here, but he can carry early as if he gets ahead he can have such an effect on laning phase for all lanes with roaming. He can carry pre-25 minutes after that not so much.

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PhOc9AmE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-06T00:58:57.788+0000)
>
> No salt here, but he can carry early as if he gets ahead he can have such an effect on laning phase for all lanes with roaming. He can carry pre-25 minutes after that not so much.

pretty much this. his MO is kill everyone capable of scaling so they dont scale as long as possible
hes winrate at min 25 is so low for being a ''midgame champ'' and he gets fck in lane by almost every champ actually zeds only good part of the game its lategame

He has the ability to play pretty safe, farming with Q, using WEQ combo when minions are pushing towards his turret so he doest have to worry about using it to escape a gank, and only go in when he has the enemy low. He is almost an AD version of Ahri. Chances are as long as he doesnt take too much damage he will always hit 6 first due to the fact that he does not have to leave lane for Mana unlike most of his matchups. What is his winrate on people that main him?

Salt here
Forgot this
Is his laning extremely forgiving? Yes
Is he great at making 90% of mages irrelevant early because of W,E,Q? Yes
theres tutorial vids showing how to make a zed useless. watch them they'll help

I actually agree with this 100%, I can't even count the # of times an enemy {{champion:238}}  got MEGA FED, like 10+ kills by 20 minutes, but because the rest of his team was even or even behind (despite {{champion:238}}  being a superb anime villan catching and killing enemies often), it didnt matter. 

Zed gets a pick, enemy team backs off 4v5, respawn happens, eventually lategame comes and zed is usually just trading 1 for 1, but then his team loses the 4v4, inhibs and eventually the game.  If 1-2 of zeds teammates are also ahead those 2-3 players can carry but I agree, zed cannot solo carry.
